Digital Accessibility Consultation

We are certified experts trained in auditing various forms of digital media. We will ensure your website, app, pdf and any other digital media fully meet all ADA requirements, Section 508 and Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG).

Contact Us

Features

Certified Section 508 Trusted Tester

Certified through The Department of Homeland Security to ensure your website and digitally published material meets the same high standard that goverment digital media is expected to meet.

WCAG Expert

We test and identify compliance violations to insure all of your digital media meets at a minimum Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.1 AA.

ADA Compliance

All local, county, state and federal agencies and any business with fifteen or more employees that relies on the general public must be fully ADA compliant. This includes the companies website and digital media.

Castello Consultation

Making digital media more accessible for everyone
